description: This file defines a React component named 'Team' for a sales growth tracker project. The component manages user data, allowing for role editing and activation toggle for users in a sales team. It fetches user data via an API, displays it in a data table with editable role inputs, and provides controls for updating user status.

methods.name: Team()
methods.description: React functional component for managing team users, including fetching data, editing roles, and toggling activation.

methods.name: toggleActive
methods.description: Asynchronous function to toggle the active status of a user.

methods.name: saveRole
methods.description: Asynchronous function to save an updated role for a user.
